type: Mobilier - Système de rayonnage mobile à haute densité.
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal (RFP) - Furniture - High Density Mobile Shelving System

### Government of Canada Notice of Opportunity (GNO)

* **Project Refrences**
	+ Project Title: Furniture - High Density Mobile Shelving System (FSMMHS)
	+ Ref. Number: WS4378440347
* **Government Notice Details**
	+ **Publication Date**: January 23, 2024
	+ **Tender Closing Date**: February 8, 2024 (14:00:00 EST)
	+ **Modification Date**: February 1, 2024
	+ **Government Notice Status**: **Cancelled**

### Solicitation Details

*   **Procurement Category**: *Goods
*   **Procurement Method**: Selective Tendering (Competitive)
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: None

### Solicitation Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to provide a High Density Mobile Shelving System for their facilities in **Winnipeg**. The Government entity anticipates awarding a contract for this requirement, and interested suppliers are invited to submit a proposal.

### Modification Details

Previous to the modification, the notice did mention an agreement indicating NoticeType

### Key Information

*   Contact: Abou Ahmad, Kassan (SPAC/PSPC) (il-lui / he-him)
*   Email: kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   No Phone number or Fax number was available

Please follow all guidelines for writing government tenders. To answer all the demands and to make a better contract or service to our required specifications. We recommend (if you are not this supplier) that you get in touch with your local contact: [Government Communication, Procurement Contact information] (https://www.canada.ca/en/treasury-board-secretariat/contact-us.html). If you want more information about this contract, you can contact that department for that required information before the proposal drafting.
The successful bidder will have to go through the processe of the governemt of Canada purchasing rules even if the users will not appeal the decision made from the survey, the profesionals will be still to be paid even though nothing happens on the contract make sure you check all the infrastructures possible about government purchasing rules and regular spec.
